original_text: “Then he will say to those on his left, ‘Depart from me, you who are cursed, into the eternal fire prepared for the devil and his angels.
korean_text: 또 왼편에 있는 자들에게 이르시되 저주를 받은 자들아 나를 떠나 마귀와 그 사자들을 위하여 예비된 영원한 불에 들어가라

sentences.original_text: Then he will say to those on his left
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그는 왼편에 있는 사람들에게 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: prepared for the devil and his angels
